title: Christmas Adventure: Candy Storm [FINAL] 2013 (HOG) Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
Lisa's grandfather Santa Claus asks her to help him with delivering Christmas presents to a remote town. While searching for a shortcut, she drives her car through an old forest , the car suddenly turns into candy! But not only that, she finds herself surrounded by various candies and sweets. Now you must help investigate what's happened and help Lisa fix it so she can get to the town and deliver the presents on time! 

Game Features:
***************
-Bright Christmas-themed artwork
-Easy and fun to play
-Festive holiday music
-Overall pleasant winter holiday atmosphere
-Touch Screen Compatible Title!

Game Info
***********
PreCracked - Just Install and Play
Cracked by: RAZZ & Velocity (Thanks!)
RePacked by: Foxy Games (wishing you happy holidays and marry christmas)
Released: 11 December 2013
Size: 275 Mb
Platform: PC / Windows
Genre(s): Hidden Object / Puzzle
Instructions:
**************
1.Download - 2.Install - 3.Play and Have Fun - 4.Keep Seeding!
